column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is always packed so definitely make reservations! In the summer
column2: it's really nice to sit in the outdoor patio
column3: although it is very crowded and you feel you're almost on top of the people sitting nect to you. The food is decent
column4: but the tables are super small! The sangria is pretty good and the service is fast. Other than that
column5: there are better tapas restaurants in the city.
